question: You will be celebrating your son’s 6th birthday next week. You want to invite one of your colleagues to attend the birthday party. Write an invitation letter to this college.In your letter,•	invite your colleague to your son’s birthday party•	give details of the party and its date and time•	say how happy you and your family would be to have him/her at the party
text: I hope this letter finds you and your family in good health. I am writing this letter to invite you to my son’s birthday party. My family and I will be glad to see you.

This will be my son's 5th birthday party. It will take place in the Children Activity Centre, which is situated opposite the Opera and Ballet Theatre, in the city centre. The party will start at 11 am. This centre provides some fun activities for children and their parents, which include puppet performances and a magic show. In addition, during all time three clowns will  amuse guests and play with children. Cake, pizza, fruits and light refreshments will be offered for participants. Furthermore, I have arranged  the cowboy's show, which will begin at the noon.
I hope you do not have any other plans on that day. We would love for you to attend. I am confident, our children will enjoy spending time together, because they are at the same ages.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma before the dependent clause marker because. Consider removing the comma.
